model_pre_prompt: Keep your response short for the user, here is the users message.

bot_commands.prompt: Ask me a question, and I'll respond with an answer.
bot_commands.setmodel: Allows user to define a differnt model sample `$setmodel llama3.2:1b` will change the model to `llama3.2:1b`.
bot_commands.models: Lists all installed models on server.
bot_commands.help: Pretty obvious what this command does.

ban_message: I am sorry, but I cannot assist you at this moment. If you believe is this is a mistake, contact the app owner.
